description.text: This ring is cut from transparent crystal. If the wearer can cast summon monster spells, the wearer adds cassian to the 3rd-level list of monsters she can summon with those spells, adds movanic deva to the 7th-level list, and adds monadic deva to the 8th-level list. Also, once per day on command the wearer can use this ring to summon a cassian, as if by the summon monster III spell.
